meanings.definition: The act of ascending or rising upward.
meanings.sent1: The ascent of the hot air balloon was slow and steady.
meanings.sent2: The mountain climber began his ascent to the peak early in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The ascent of the squirrel up the tree was quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: Her career took a sudden ascent after she won the award.
meanings.sent5: The rocket's fiery ascent into the sky left everyone in awe.

meanings.sent1: The bird's graceful ascent into the sky was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent2: The elevator's smooth ascent to the top floor was quick.
meanings.sent3: The balloon's unexpected ascent startled the passengers.
meanings.sent4: His ascent in the company was well-deserved due to his hard work.
meanings.sent5: The kite's colorful ascent in the wind delighted the children.

meanings.sent1: The hiker struggled with the steep ascent of the trail.
meanings.sent2: The road had a gradual ascent as it wound up the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The ascent of the roller coaster made everyone scream with excitement.
meanings.sent4: The ascent of the hill was challenging but rewarding for the cyclists.
meanings.sent5: The ski slope's steep ascent provided a thrilling ride down.
